Uses of Class
edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject.Map

  • Packages that use Map 
    Package Description
    edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject  

    • Uses of Map in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject

      Fields in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject declared as Map 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Map Save.theMap
      The single Map object that will store all of the data for each individual Area on the map's grid.
      Methods in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject that return Map 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map Save.getMap()
      This method will return this object's Map object whenever the game is loaded.
      Methods in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject with parameters of type Map 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Person.die(Map m) 
      void Jedi.die(Map m)
      The die method will set all the Jedi's fields to null, so that the Jedi will be out of the game.
      int Player.look(int d, Map m)
      The look method will look two spaces ahead of the player in the direction given.
      void Player.move(int d, Map m)
      This method will move the player's location to the next spot in one place.
      void Jedi.move(int d, Map m)
      The move method will generate a random number 1 <= x <=4 and move the Jedi 1 space in that direction (1 up, 2 right, 3 down, 4 left).
      void Save.setMap(Map m)
      This method will set the field theMap to the parameter m for whenever the game is saved.
      void Player.shoot(int d, Map m)
      The shoot method will check to see if there are any Jedi in the path of direction d, and then it will call the Gun.shoot() method.
      boolean Jedi.stab(Player p, Map m)
      The stab method will check each space next to the Jedi to see if the player is inside, and if he or she is, it will call the Player.die() method.
